attributes.action: improve the choice of candidates that people can vote for.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone should be able to choose from any candidate on a national list, including local ones. Postal votes would be used and there would be one month to choose a candidate. 

The person with the most votes would be Prime Minister and the 650 candidates with the most votes could attend parliament.

Represenatives' income & power to vote in parliament would be in direct proportion to the number of people that voted for them.

If they lose trust in their MP, voters can switch their representative, and therefore alter the representatives' income & power in parliament, at any time. Votes would change from a cross on a bit of paper to a contract of trust. 

Parliament would become a proper market place for the best politicians and ideas, not about winning elections. 

Upgrade democracy to version 2!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament or the Electoral Commission
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
